name: One Duck
description:
One Duck is a game about the green duck. You help him with his daily tasks to get along with his fellow tortoises!

Your main goal is to collect as many tortoises   as possible. 

Avoid collecting flowers  - they will screw duck's day up!

Controls:
  • You'll need a keyboard and a mouse
  • Press ESC to pause the game
  • Press  to go back to the map
  • Look for clickable things!
  • Most additional controls are explained in the game itself!
Thank you for playing! Music credit:
